original_text: She came up behind him and touched the fringe of his garment, and immediately her discharge of blood ceased.
korean_text: 예수의 뒤로 와서 그의 옷 가에 손을 대니 혈루증이 즉시 그쳤더라

sentences.original_text: and touched the fringe of his garment
and immediately her discharge of blood ceased
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 즉시 그녀의 피 흐름이 멈췄다
